comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when set a date time group to regular group.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v20070906-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a cube binding with sample data set ORDERS as its primary 
   data set.
2. Drag ORDERDATE to add a group and "Group Level" dialogue pops up, 
   select "Regular Group" radio button and click OK.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
eclipse.buildId=I20070625-1500
java.version=1.5.0_07
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=zh_CN
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86
